instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00165: What is 820-00165? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> left usb not working
threads.message: Please I need help here guys.. <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> left USB not working , there?s power but no data. I have replaced the I/O BOARD AND CABLE , the right USB works fine?I also replaced <DIODE>D9510</DIODE>, <DIODE>D9511</DIODE>, <DIODE>D9520</DIODE>, and <DIODE>D9521</DIODE> but still no changes , Any ideas please

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> left usb not working
threads.message:
Inspect LIO connector on MLB.
Check diode mode readings on its USB data lines, including <SIGNAL>XDP_USB_EXTB_OC_L</SIGNAL>.
Check <RESISTOR>R1580</RESISTOR>-83 resistors.
Also post voltage for <SIGNAL>XDP_USB_EXTB_OC_L</SIGNAL>, with and w/o any USB device connected.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> left usb not working
threads.message: The Usb is sorted ... <SIGNAL>XDP_USB_EXTB_OC_L</SIGNAL> was missing

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> left usb not working
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> left usb not working
threads.message:
"<SIGNAL>XDP_USB_EXTB_OC_L</SIGNAL> was missing"
Bad <RESISTOR>R5181</RESISTOR>, or what?
Is the overcurrent signal from USB power port to PCH.
If goes low, PCH disables that port.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> left usb not working
threads.message: Bad <RESISTOR>R1581</RESISTOR> , so replaced it , sorry I replied late
